forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a soothing sun begins to cast its gentle warmth upon the city, with a high creeping towards a brisk 64 degrees. The air is punctuated by the playful ballet of wind, teasing branches and beckoning the float of the clouds above. As shadows stretch and move, there is a delightful clarity to the day—a pleasant shift from the fog that often enshrouds this coastal enclave, now pulling back to yield clear vistas, particularly to the famous Golden Gate Bridge and the undulating hills beyond.

As evening approaches, expect the skies to transform into a quilt of partial clouds, offering a softer ambiance that perfectly complements the mild temperatures settling around 56 degrees. With the wind continuing to swirl, a light jacket would serve well against any lingering chill, especially as you wander the charming streets or perhaps savor a leisurely stroll along the waterfront. Such conditions invite the simple pleasures of life—finding a cozy café to enjoy a warm drink, or indulging in the art of conversation with a friend as the sun dips lower. A day well spent under the vast canopy of the sky, effortlessly weaving serenity into the fabric of urban charm.
